long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get Out, Be Social - rapid event creator.

This extension will recognise when you are browsing a Facebook event, and will add an icon to the Chrome address bar.

Clicking on the icon will read the Facebook event details, send it to GOBS, then allow you to 'tweak' the listing before submitting it.

... you can now add events in the blink of an eye!

... come on ... Get Out ... Be Social!
